Literature.Title: Broad-spectrum hybrid antimicrobial peptides derived from PMAP-23 with potential LPS binding ability.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=>128µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>128µM)
